title: Barnsley sign Cordoba left-back Dani Pinillos
description: Barnsley have confirmed the signing of Spanish left-back Dani Pinillos on a two-and-a-half year deal.
content:
The 25-year-old has sealed a move to Oakwell to mark a return to England.
Pinillos has previously played in the Sky Bet Championship during a two-year spell with Nottingham Forest, before moving back to Spain.
He joins Kieffer Moore as a new addition for the south Yorkshire club during the January transfer window.
Pinillos has been allocated the number 23 shirt at Barnsley.
